nodes.text: Arelik Armor was a type of personal battle armor designed by Stavren Arelik and was used by bounty hunters during the Galactic Civil War. It provided moderate protection against attacks and was designed to be fitted with sensor modules. One drawback was the form-fitting nature of the armor required any power cells to be mounted to the outside of the armor, making them vulnerable to enemy fire. The famed bounty hunter Beylyssa wore a modified set of this armor equipped with a sensor pod, infrared sensors, a turbo-projected grappling hook, a winch, and an environment filter.
